movies.title: L'incomprise
movies.plot: Rome, 1984, Aria is nine-year-old girl. On the verge of divorce, Aria's infantile and selfish parents are too preoccupied with their careers and extra-marital affairs to properly tend to any of Aria's needs. While her two older sisters are pampered, Aria is treated with cold indifference. Yet she yearns to love and to be loved. At school, Aria excels academically but is considered a misfit by everyone. She is misunderstood. Aria finds comfort in her cat - Dac and in her best friend - Angelica. Thrown out of both parents' homes, abandoned by all, even her best friend, Aria finally reaches the limit of what she can bear. She makes an unexpected decision in her life.
movies.simplePlot: Rome, 1984, Aria is nine-year-old girl. On the verge of divorce, Aria's infantile and selfish parents are too preoccupied with their careers and extra-marital affairs to properly tend to ...

biography.bio: Giulia Salerno was born on July 15, 2001 in Civitavecchia, Lazio, Italy as Giulia A. Salerno. She is an actress, known for L'incomprise (2014), Tutta la vita davanti (2008) and A Perfect Day (2008).
biography.name: Giulia Salerno

biography.bio: Charlotte Gainsbourg was born in London, England in 1971. She is an Anglo-French actress and singer. The daughter of English actress Jane Birkin and French singer and songwriter Serge Gainsbourg, she was raised in Paris. Gainsbourg made her motion picture debut in 1984. In 1986, Gainsbourg won a César Award for "Most Promising Actress", and, in 2000, she won "Best Supporting Actress" for the film La Bûche. In 1993, Gainsbourg made her English speaking debut in The Cement Garden, written and directed by her uncle, Andrew Birkin. She made her stage debut in 1994 in David Mamet's Oleanna at the Théâtre de la Gaîté-Montparnasse. In 1996, Gainsbourg starred as the title character in Jane Eyre, a film adaption of Charlotte Brontë's 1847 novel. In 2006, Gainsbourg appeared alongside Gael García Bernal in Michel Gondry's The Science of Sleep. In 2007, she appeared as Claire in the Todd Haynes-directed Bob Dylan biopic I'm Not There, also contributing a cover of the Dylan song "Just Like a Woman" to the film soundtrack. In 2009, she won the award for Best Actress at the 2009 Cannes Film Festival for the film Antichrist. Gainsbourg starred in the French/Australian production, The Tree, released in 2010, and in Lars Von Trier's science fiction disaster film, Melancholia.
biography.name: Charlotte Gainsbourg

biography.bio: Gabriel Garko was born on July 12, 1972 in Turin, Italy as Dario Oliviero. He is an actor, known for His Secret Life (2001), L'incomprise (2014) and Callas Forever (2002).
biography.name: Gabriel Garko

biography.bio: Mario Bois is an actor, known for La Sapienza (2014), The Entrepreneur (2011) and L'incomprise (2014).
biography.name: Mario Bois

biography.bio: Olimpia Carlisi (Campi Bisenzio) is an Italian actress. Father of Sicilian origin, she spent her childhood and youth in Florence. Theater performer off and avant-garde of the seventies and eighties she starred, among others, in "Il Casanova" di Federico Fellini, "La tragedia di un uomo ridicolo" by Bernardo Bertolucci, "Tu mi turbi" by Roberto Benigni, "Dalla nube alla Resistenza by Straub and Huillet (taken, in part, from the novel by Cesare Pavese the moon and the bonfires) and "La finestra di fronte" by Ferzan Ozpetek. She conducted the Sanremo Festival in 1980 along with Claudio Cecchetto, Roberto Benigni and Daniel Leads. In 2011 is the voice of Federico Fellini in the documentary "Fellini's Circus", directed by Adriano Apra. After a long absence, returns to direct the film by Asia Argento "Incompresa" movie (2014).
biography.name: Olimpia Carlisi

biography.bio: Anna Lou Castoldi was born on June 20, 2001 in Lugano, Ticino, Switzerland. She is an actress, known for L'incomprise (2014).
biography.name: Anna Lou Castoldi

biography.bio: Max Gazzè was born on July 6, 1967 in Rome, Lazio, Italy. He is an actor and composer, known for Basilicata Coast to Coast (2010), Lasciami per sempre (2017) and L'incomprise (2014). He is married to Maria. They have three children.
biography.name: Max Gazzè

biography.bio: Antony Hickling was born on November 8, 1975 in Johannesburg, South Africa. He is an actor and director, known for Birth 3 - La mort d'un triptyque (2010), L'Annonciation or The Conception of a Little Gay Boy (2011) and Little Gay Boy, chrisT is Dead (2012).
biography.name: Antony Hickling

biography.bio: Alice Pea is an actress, known for L'incomprise (2014).
biography.name: Alice Pea

biography.bio: Justin Pearson is an actor and composer, known for Cecil B. Demented (2000), Parallel Planes (2017) and Retox : Ten Pounds of Shit in a Five Pound Bag (2011).
biography.name: Justin Pearson

biography.bio: Carolina Poccioni was born on February 28, 1998 in Rome, Italy. She is an actress, known for L'incomprise (2014), Voce del verbo amore (2007) and Faccio un salto all'Avana (2011).
biography.name: Carolina Poccioni

biography.bio: Gianmarco Tognazzi was born on October 11, 1967 in Rome, Lazio, Italy as Gian Marco Tognazzi. He is an actor, known for Ultrà (1991), S.O.S. (1999) and Je voyage seule (2013). He has been married to Valeria Pintore since 2006. They have two children.
biography.name: Gianmarco Tognazzi

awards.award: Italian National Syndicate of Film Journalists 2014

titlesAwards.titleAwardOutcome: Won Guglielmo Biraghi Award - Special Mention
